Tour of Bobst's Instructional Materials Center
Tour of Bobst's Instructional Materials Center

Format: 1/2" open reel video; Duration: 30 minutes; Transfer Technician Notes: "This tape contains only about 4 minutes of content. All the video content is very unstable and has poor vertical hold. Most of the content has extremely low audio levels, but the audio could not be raised without clipping the louder audio in the last segment. Headswitch error in underscan"
